entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:35 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 06:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: NNE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
